name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Boil spaghetti until al dente. In a saucepan, cook ground beef with tomato sauce, garlic, and onion. Combine and garnish with parmesan cheese.
author: Chef Anna

name: Vegetable Stir-fry
description: Chop vegetables. Heat oil in a wok, stir-fry vegetables with soy sauce and garlic until crisp-tender. Serve over steamed rice.
author: Chef Li

name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
description: Cook pasta until al dente. In a skillet, sauté mushrooms with garlic and cream. Toss with cooked pasta and serve.
author: Chef Marco

name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Grill chicken breasts, slice, and toss with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing. Top with grated parmesan.
author: Chef Bella

name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: Simmer fresh tomatoes with basil, onion, and garlic. Blend until smooth and serve with a drizzle of cream.
author: Chef Mia

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
description: Sauté shrimp in a skillet with garlic and butter. Garnish with parsley and serve with crusty bread.
author: Chef Leo

name: Vegetable Curry
description: Cook diced vegetables with curry spices, coconut milk, and a touch of tomato paste. Serve with rice or naan bread.
author: Chef Priya

name: Classic Pancakes
description: Mix batter from flour, eggs, milk, and a pinch of sugar. Cook in a skillet and serve with syrup or fruit.
author: Chef Betty

name: Roasted Vegetable Medley
description: Chop vegetables, toss in olive oil and herbs, and roast until caramelized. Serve as a side or main dish.
author: Chef Ian

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Butter bread, layer with cheddar cheese, and grill in a pan until golden and melty. Serve with soup.
author: Chef Lily

name: Homemade Pizza
description: Spread pizza dough with tomato sauce, top with mozzarella and toppings of choice, then bake until crispy.
author: Chef Antonio

name: Chicken Fried Rice
description: Stir-fry cooked rice with diced chicken, frozen peas, eggs, and soy sauce for a quick meal.
author: Chef Ken

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Cook beef strips with mushrooms and onions in a creamy sauce. Serve over egg noodles.
author: Chef Mark

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layer lasagna sheets with marinara sauce, ricotta cheese, and mixed vegetables. Bake until golden.

name: Chicken Alfredo

name: Shepherd's Pie
